short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Find direct contact information for short-term rental properties by searching listing names.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
SS Spyglass helps you to find direct contact information for short term rental properties listed in our database by searching for listing names directly in the extension.

How It Works:
-Copy and paste the full name of a rental property into the SS Spyglass extension to find matching listings in our database.
-Either click on the listing preview to view the listing page, or use the buttons below to contact the host via their preferred contact method(s).
